name: com.myunitytools.sceneloader
description: A package that standardizes the scene loading process among many different possibilities, including support for Coroutines, C# Tasks, UniTask and Addressables.

samples.description: Example implementation of the SceneLoaderAsync class.
Example implementation of the SceneLoaderCoroutine class.
Example implementation of the SceneLoaderUniTask class.
Example implementation of the AddressableSceneLoaderAsync class.
Example implementation of the AddressableSceneLoaderCoroutine class.
Example implementation of the AddressableSceneLoaderUniTask class.
